lead_paragraph: To the Editor: ''Affirmative Action in Play'' (editorial, Nov. 6) ignores that much of the opposition to affirmative action has resulted from the fact that the program now covers everyone except for white males. The Civil Rights Acts of the 1960's were intended to correct injustices done to those living with the legacy of slavery. They were not intended to include people who moved to this country and declared themselves entitled to special help.
abstract: Bernard Wishnia letter contends that much of opposition to affirmative action stems from fact that program intended for black victims of slavery now covers everyone except white males (S)

headline.main: Affirmative Action Rollback Exposes Inequity; For Victims of Slavery
